title: Business Analysis –Target Operating Model (TOM)
description:
We are hiring BA-TOM for a dynamic and innovative transformational consulting company committed to providing tailored solutions to businesses of all sizes

Responsibilities


Experience and exposure within Investment Banking on operating model design and deployment and having delivered global change initiatives and programs.
Document operating model elements in consultation with various stakeholders and leadership teams across Market Securities Services function.
Attend working groups to manage cross divisional design.
Contribute to workshops across workstreams to facilitate the design of target and transitional operating models.
Good understanding of project management and BA skill sets such as MS Visio, JIRA
Target Operating Model experience in Investment Banking and sound understanding of business princip


Qualifications


Business Analyst Experience
8+ years of experience in Capital Markets with exposure to Market Securities Services / Investment Banking management related activities or projects.
Prior experience with Target operational model and process reengineering is preferable


Skills: ba skill sets,jira,market securities services,global change initiatives,investment banking,capital markets,ms visio,operating model design,process reengineering,business analysis,project management
